messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Messages messed up
messages.msgSnippet: This has been a big problem for several groups.  We are all hoping that Yahoo groups figures things out soon. chris
messages.messageBody:
This has been a big problem for several groups.  We are all hoping that Yahoo groups figures things out soon.  
chris


On Mon, Sep 9, 2013 at 4:28 PM, Pam Sorooshian <pamsoroosh@...> wrote:
 

I started watching over the past few days and there are some bad glitches happening in yahoogroups. I am a moderator on this list and a couple of posts I approved didn't show up for almost 2 days after I approved them. 

I've also noticed that some posts I could see on the website never made it to my email. 

The same thing is happening on another list I moderate.

So -let's assume it isn't just us and be patient with each other and hope yahoo will figure out how to fix it. 

pam

messages.messageBody:
I started watching over the past few days and there are some bad glitches happening in yahoogroups. I am a moderator on this list and a couple of posts I approved didn't show up for almost 2 days after I approved them. 

I've also noticed that some posts I could see on the website never made it to my email. 

The same thing is happening on another list I moderate.

So -let's assume it isn't just us and be patient with each other and hope yahoo will figure out how to fix it. 

pam
